text: The Persian Gulf Pro League () formerly known as Iran Pro League (IPL) () is the highest level of professional football in Iran. ==All-time Premier League standings== Since the 2001-2002 season, IPL/Persian Gulf Cup has had nine seasons completed. The table below shows the all-time statistics of all teams attended in the 9 seasons held. Pos.
